row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_TOMCAT.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX
:SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_TC_HOME_DIR# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_UNIX_STYLE :SET &UC4RB_TC_HOME_DIR# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
function deploy_application { if [ -d "$1" ] || [ -f "$1" ] ; then path="file:/$1" java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#/tomcat-tool.jar" tomcat DeployApplication "&UC4RB_TC_HOME_DIR#" &UC4RB_TC_BASE_URL# &UC4RB_TC_MGR_APP# &UC4RB_TC_USERNAME# &UC4RB_TC_PASSWORD# "$path" "&UC4RB_TC_CONTEXT_PATH#" "NO" "NO" "NO" "NO" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX return fi echo "'$1' does not exist for rollback." }
server_xml="&UC4RB_TC_HOME_DIR#/conf/server.xml" app_path="&UC4RB_BACKUP_DIRECTORY#/&UC4RB_TC_CONTEXT_NAME#" if [ ! -d "$app_path" ] ; then app_path="$app_path.war" fi
:IF &UC4RB_APP_EXIST# = "YES" echo "Application '&UC4RB_TC_CONTEXT_NAME#' exist before. Deploy application..." : IF &UC4RB_SERVER_FARM# = "YES" watchDir=$(echo 'xpath /Server/Service/Engine/Host/Cluster/Deployer[@watchEnabled="true"]/@watchDir' | xmllint --shell "$server_xml" | grep "content=" | awk -F"=" '{print $NF}') if [ -z "$watchDir" ] ; then echo "Server assumes not cluster deployment or watchDir is not specified." deploy_application "$app_path" else echo "Server is cluster deployment. Copy '$app_path' to '$watchDir'." \cp -f -r "$app_path" "$watchDir" fi : ELSE echo "Server assumes not cluster deployment." deploy_application "$app_path" : ENDIF : ELSE echo "Application '&UC4RB_TC_CONTEXT_NAME#' does not exist before." :ENDIF
